body.head: Digital Humaniteis & Text Technology
body.p: VICAV has been designed from the very beginning as a project bridging the gap between traditional concepts in the humanities and innovative technological approaches. We have been building our work on the paradigms of the digital humanity community: digital tools and data, collaborative settings and open science are the basis of our work.

By text technology we understand a broad spectrum of methods and tools being applied to a wide range of applications beyond the narrower field of computational linguistics with its focus on large corpora and mainly statistical approaches.
